item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. GPT-4.5: "Not a frontier model"? (68 points | 35 comments)
2. Raspberry Pi Pico audio player (46 points | 13 comments)
3. Show HN: I built a modern Goodreads alternative (111 points | 89 comments)
4. Lifestyle of out of touch execs who are pushing return to office (47 points | 4 comments)
5. Google does not want rights to things you do using Chrome (2008) (46 points | 14 comments)
6. When This Professor Got Cancer, He Didn't Quit. He Taught a Class About It (22 points | 2 comments)
7. Towards a test-suite for TOTP codes (9 points | discuss)
8. The early days of Linux (2023) (396 points | 107 comments)
9. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (520 points | 52 comments)
10. Show HN: SafeHaven – A Minimal VPN Implementation in Go (20 points | 3 comments)
11. Mark Cuban offers to fund former 18f employees (274 points | 274 comments)
12. ‘Slime’ keeps the brain safe ― and could guard against ageing (126 points | 42 comments)
13. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (50 points | 48 comments)
14. A few words about indie app business (33 points | 8 comments)
15. Knowing CSS is mastery to Front end Development (120 points | 119 comments)
16. How Flash games shaped the video game industry (2020) (199 points | 119 comments)
17. Ask HN: Where are the good Markdown to PDF tools (that meet these requirements)? (8 points | 6 comments)
18. The lost boys: how a generation of young men fell behind women on pay (19 points | 23 comments)
19. The three-dimensional Kakeya conjecture, after Wang and Zahl (36 points | 1 comment)
20. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (284 points | 58 comments)
21. Crossing the uncanny valley of conversational voice (330 points | 176 comments)
22. Firefly Blue Ghost Mission 1 Lunar Landing (168 points | 35 comments)
23. Free introns of tRNAs as complementarity-dependent regulators of gene expression (22 points | 4 comments)
24. Louis Rossmann opines on the Firefox debacle [video] (58 points | 46 comments)
25. Trust in Firefox and Mozilla Is Gone – Let's Talk Alternatives (156 points | 124 comments)
26. Show HN: Recommendarr – AI Driven Recommendations Based on Sonarr/Radarr Media (9 points | 1 comment)
27. The A.I. Monarchy (153 points | 163 comments)
28. Show HN: Robyn – “Batman Inspired” Python Web Framework Built with Rust (66 points | 47 comments)
29. Euclid finds complete Einstein Ring in NGC galaxy (148 points | 39 comments)
30. Show HN: I made a website where you can create your own "Life in Weeks" timeline (225 points | 61 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
